creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: female figure with hat and scarf sitting, cradling an infant; male figure at LL watches; trees framing scene at L; mountain with castle in background
marks:
Signature, Mark

in graphite on verso: Altdorfer monogram in plate, upper center: [AA]
provenance: Wilhelm August Ackermann; 'sale, Sotheby's, London, July 13, 1972 to Tunick; ['David Tunick, New York, until 1974; sold to Helmut Rumbler]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Rest on the Flight into Egypt
